title: About Me
subtitle: Your personal career helper
description: Hi, I'm Marcel! I help people create professional resumes and optimize their application documents. With many years of experience and modern AI support, I offer you completely free help - especially for people with psychological challenges or disabilities.

motivation.title: My Motivation
motivation.text: I believe everyone deserves a fair chance at their dream job. That's why I offer my help completely free and focus particularly on people who face additional challenges in the application process.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.text: Personal, empathetic, and solution-oriented. Together we create your individual application strategy and optimize your documents until they convince.

experience.title: Experience & Expertise
experience.text: Years of experience in HR, knowledge of modern AI tools and a deep understanding of what recruiters are looking for.
